home.text_base_description: Arden Two-Level Penthouse w Rooftop Terrace! 1348sf interior PLUS 800sf of outdoor space, office nook & bay views. 2016 Bosa development in sunny Mission Bay. Residence 907 has it all! Storage, AC, EV-charger parking. Upgraded wood flooring throughout main level, custom built-in closets & cabinetry, smarthome LED lights & Hunter Douglas shades. Kitchen boasts a massive Caesarstone counter, walk-in pantry, W/ D in-unit. Thermador appliances, gas range, oversized fridge. Large primary suite includes a walk-in & reach-in closet. Second level features wall-to-wall glass enclosed office which opens out to your own rooftop terrace. Perfect for gardening or socially distanced gathering. Arden is situated along the channel of Mission Bay, dog park, children's playground and parks. Arden offers 24hr concierge, TWO gyms -cardio room featuring 2 Peloton bikes & weight room, 75ft heated pool, 3 lounges, BBQ, pet-wash station. Chase Center, Oracle Park, MUNI Caltrain, HWY-280, Uber LYFT & other HQs.

home_facts.Property_Type: Townhouse, Hi-Rise (9+), Top Floor, 2 Level, Luxury, Condominium
